name: Leashed Soul (itch)
description:
★★★ IT IS FREE -- GET IT! PLAY IT! SHARE IT! ★★★

It's a TRICKY perspective LOGIC-PUZZLE mobile game that CHALLENGES YOUR MIND AND DELIGHT YOUR SENSES. HELP BEYDO TO SAVE LIFE, AND PLANT AS MANY MONUMENTAL TREES AS POSSIBLE. YOU SHOULD FIGURE OUT THE WAYS HOW TO HOLDING THE TRAPPED SEEDS. Saving the Earth isn't so easy!***Our team created an immersive perspective logic game with a heart-warming story, unique style with smooth controls to bring an epic experience for everyone. Players help Beydo in his adventure, they need to swipe through the levels while solving monument puzzles and rebuild everything that Beydo lost. After the players completed all levels of the game, could discover Beydo's quest hopefully with happy end. PLAYERS CAN EXPERIENCE ALL LEVELS OF FEELINGS, will be depressed in the dark winter, and will feel happy with the rebirth of nature in spring.

The Story of Beydo

Once upon a time our Hero Beydo, the boy – who is a wooden doll – got a gift from Mother Nature. He's got the best gift that a wooden doll can get. The gift of a real life... When he realized that he lives, he started a quest. His quest was to give as many life as he could give during his short life….and this is the point where the story begins....

Our game, Leashed Soul is a strange combination of the popular puzzle games, with emotional power and narrative gameplay. We were inspired by mannequin doll but CREATED UNIQUE CHARACTER, STORY AND GAMEPLAY.

Features

★ EMOTIONAL BACKGROUND STORY, rebuild the valley of trees mission!

★ Heartwarming hero character, named Beydo

★ NARRATIVE DESIGNED storyboard, HIGH QUALITY graphics

★ Adventure puzzle structure that challenges your mind in this beautiful block world!

★ Deep and addictive gameplay with collectable hidden treasures

★ Hand-crafted 50 levels with wide variety of blocks (grass, wood, trap, stone)

★ Rebuild Beydo's block island world

★ BEAUTIFUL PIXEL ART STYLE, realistic physic on the trees and the elements of the levels

★ Interesting items: changing seasons and biomes, valves, slippery ice, flying blocks, cube etc. – these elements are the keys of the gameplay

★ Relaxing themes and stress relief music

HELP BEYDO IN HIS ADVENTURE!

Follow Beydo ➡️ Beydo's FACEBOOK page

Please, don't forget to tell your experiences, rate our app, and post a comment!
